# Trait Removal (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** [[5th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 5]], [[5th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 5]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 10th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 10]]

**Components:** V, S, M (a pinch of ash)

**Casting Time:** 1 hour

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** One touched living creature

**Duration:** 1 hour/level

**Saving Throw:** Fortitude negates

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Serpent Kingdoms (WotC), pg. 158

You temporarily remove one extraordinary or supernatural ability of your choice from the target creature. This spell does not work on constructs, oozes, or undead.
